11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ja'far bin Al-Muttalib bin Abi Wada'ah that:His father said: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) recited Surat An-Najm in Makkah and prostrated, and those who were with him prostrated. I raised my head and refused to prostrate." At that time Al-Muttalib had not yet accepted Islam
